explanation: Rohan claims he left the office at 8 PM to pick up his brother whose flight landed at 9:30 PM. But Clue 3 reveals the Denver flight was delayed until 11:15 PM â€” Rohan would have known since the delay was posted at 3 PM. He lied about leaving at 8 PM to create a false departure time. Clue 1 shows the file was replaced at 8:55 PM using Rohan's own credentials. Clue 2 confirms a man was still at a desk on the client services floor at 8:30 PM.
